definition: Stop it! (Beijing and Internet slang)/Game over!/You're dead!
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: If reputation mattered Samsung would've been out of business for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 如果名聲真的重要，三星早就歇菜了。

sentences.english: The outspoken cabinet member was sidelined by the President.
sentences.chinese: 因爲大嘴巴，總統就讓這位內閣成員歇菜了。

sentences.english: We'll be finished if it's over by today.
sentences.chinese: 今天做不完，我們就歇菜了。

definition: lame (unimpressive)/a huge letdown/not to try at all
(coll.) to quit one's job in disgust
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out
to be dead/not to be, or cease to exist
won't do/be out of the question/be no good/not work/not be capable
